Melissa Schiff is the daughter of Marlene S. Schiff and Dr. Haskel Schiff as you can see in the actual announcement of her wedding with Robert Soros, son of George Soros:

However the couple filed for divorce in 2014:

Billionaire George Soros' eldest son, Robert, not only followed in his father's financier footsteps, holding a top post at the family investment fund, he also inherited his dad's famous problems with women.
